tasks.label: configure-debug
args: if (Test-Path "${workspaceFolder}\_build\_debug") { exit 0 } else { & "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\Common7\Tools\Launch-VsDevShell.ps1"; cmake -S "${workspaceFolder}" -B "${workspaceFolder}/_build" -G Ninja -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug }

tasks.label: configure-release
args: if (Test-Path "${workspaceFolder}\_build\_release") { exit 0 } else { & "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\Common7\Tools\Launch-VsDevShell.ps1"; cmake -S "${workspaceFolder}" -B "${workspaceFolder}/_build" -G Ninja -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release }
